subject: Re: Dear sir/ma,
body:
Hello Mr.Robert,

I received your email message this morning which you sent yesterday,well
the information you received was a first class information because that was
exactly what happens. Of course your email drew my attention to remember
when this incident happens last few month precisely last year, It might be
too hard to believe that someone would go to such lengths connived with a
strange and gave him guidelines on how your unpaid payment should be
diverted.

The details I can provide in regards to this situation now is to know if
you are alive not dead as they claimed with those officials that piloted
the false information that you are no longer alive. The Saudi man is a
businessman and he has a common relationship with the Nigeria past
President Mohamadu Buhari so it was during his tenure this their criminal
arrangement was executed with some of those government officials.

Basically,with the connections he has here made him to go far paying fees
as the beneficiary of the contract sum, all the fees required from various
ministries has been taken care of by him,he paid all the processing fees
such as '' Contract Award Certificate, Proof of Ownership of the Fund,CBN
Claim ownership Fund, Approved order from the Ministry of Finance etc.

As you wish to know the role the presidency played in all of this matter,
The presidency stopped the Debt Management Office (DMO) for given him their
endorsement when he failed to present his original documents of his visit
to Nigeria as a contractor that was where his problem started because his
good friend president Buhari's government is no more in power, so the new
elected president Ahmed Bola Tinubu gave an instruction not to release the
contract payment to anyone until investigations are done accordingly.

Finally, now you have contacted me with the good news that you are alive,
we should proceed with the evidence of your details that you are alive such
as.

Your Full Name:

Home Address:

Country/City

First page of your passport is required which has to be submitted to the
finance ministry that you alive.

Your Bank details:

Your telephone Number and your current email address.

So if I can get those 5 items today, by tomorrow I will submit it to
finance ministry and they will call for your immediate transfer payment.

I wait for your email,
Regards,

Danladi Ahmed
